#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int n, i, a, max, pos, *count;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    count = (int *)malloc(n*sizeof(int));
    memset(count, n, 0);
    for (i=0; i<n; i++)
    {
        scanf("%d", &a);
        count[a-1]++;
    }
    max = count[0];
    pos = 1;
    for (i=1; i<n; i++)
    {
        if (count[i]>max)
        {
            max = count[i];
            pos = i+1;
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n%d\n", pos, max);
    return 0;
}
